# interitemSpacing

**Instance Property**

The spacing between full screen browser items.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute double interitemSpacing;
```

## Modifying a Browser

- **maskInset**: The insets from the edges of the full screen layout.
- **cornerRadius**: The corner radius of each full screen browser item.

items.description: The insets from the edges of the full screen layout.
